学会発表

  • [セッション] #V043 Submarine Volcanism: Advances in Observations, Methods, and Models I
  • [題目] #V043-04 Unexpectedly large tsunamis generated by submarine volcanic earthquakes: Evidence of trapdoor faulting at a submarine caldera アブストラクト
  • [著者] 三反畑修，綿田辰吾，佐竹健治，金森博雄，Rivera Luis，Zhan Zhongwen
